formattedAddress: 60 W 129th St, New York, NY 10027, USA
adrFormatAddress: 60 W 129th St, New York, NY 10027, USA

originalText.text:
Have been taking Pilates at Harlem Pilates for the last year. The teachers are amazing & the energy of the studio captures their energy perfectly. The owner knows how to spot great instructors & the clients get to benefit from it in each & every class.
You can join as a monthly member or sign up for an individual class or a pack of classes. The studio meets you where you need to be on your fitness journey and you always feel great after a solid Pilates workout.

originalText.text:
This will be my spot whenever I’m in NYC!  Another pilates/yoga studio near Columbia University’s campus that I reached out to was very rude and not honoring of the prices posted on their website so, I looked for another place to patron.  Harlem Pilates IS THE PLACE!!!  I will be recommending them to all of my local friends, my air bnb host, and for my daughter when she attends university here.  Scheduling was easy!  Online rates were clear and easy to book promotional packages (as well as all other packages).  Pam was super sweet.  Great class and she helped advise me on how to plan the rest of my week doing Pilates at their studio!  They have three locations that are easy to get to, very clean and organized, fair and reasonable rates and very much worth my money!
Thank you for being exceptional!

originalText.text:
I couldn’t be happier to have done this morning my first class at Harlem Pilates to have such a charming and professional studio next to my place is just fantastic.

This morning I did a class with Brienne d’Amaro and behind those pretty eyes it was no jokes! She was careful on checking all the time our positions to make sure that we were getting all the strength of her exercises.

Tiffany Mason the owner beside her rocking body has all the warmth of Harlem in her petit figure. She has decorated the place in the most charming way you feel at home.

The new place in Harlem to get your body back on track ladies and gentlemen !

originalText.text: I love the intimacy of this Pilates studio and the amazing range of teachers at different levels. 100% recommend

text.text: I love the intimacy of this Pilates studio and the amazing range of teachers at different levels. 100% recommend

originalText.text: Today was my first time and I can’t wait to go back! I did the jumping class today and although my legs feel like spaghetti, I definitely feel eager to work out more. Brienne was a great instructor.
